hilbert-operators.commenet: Over-engineered operator kit for middle-phase guardrails

resolvents.definition: J_A = (I + λA)^{-1} for maximal monotone A.
resolvents.property: J_A firmly nonexpansive ⇒ suitable for guardrail feasibility projections.
resolvents.usage: Choose A as normal cone operator of C derived from guardrails-begin invariants.

proximal.mapping: Use φ as penalty counting invariant violations pulled from guardrails-middle validation matrix.
proximal.relation: prox_{φ} = J_{∂φ} (Moreau identity) = layered onto G in operators.xml.

semigroup.generator: A defined via strong limit: A x = lim_{t→0+} (S(t)x - x)/t.
semigroup.engineering: Encode gradual guardrail ramp-ups as S(t); ensure generator dissipative to keep norms bounded.

spectral.decomposition: When T is normal contraction, T = ∫_σ λ dE(λ).
spectral.guardrail-view: Partition σ into safe vs corrective bands; adjust policies via spectral projectors.
spectral.bound: ρ(T)<1 ensures ∑_{k≥0} T^k converges ⇒ finite energy for enforcement sequences.

commutators.property: ‖[P_obs, P_pol]‖ controls divergence between observability/policy layers (see layers.xml).
commutators.engineering: Enforce norm ≤ ε derived from continuum telemetry budgets.
